title: Better Call Nate: Want to Create an Estuary/TLC Conference? Announcing Estuary Leadership Council
summary: The Estuary Leadership Council (ELC) will not organize conferences but will offer support and advice to those interested in organizing conferences. They can help with venue suggestions, finding small group discussion leaders, and coordinating with local churches. Knowing your target audience and theme is important when planning a conference. Building the conversation online can help grow interest and engagement in the conference. Contact Nate for support with organizing a conference.
